remarks: Commutative/associative law for Abelian groups.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ablcom.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
ablo4 $p |- ( ( G e. AbelOp /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ ( C e. X /\ D e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) G ( C G D ) ) = ( ( A G C ) G ( B G D ) ) ) $.
